trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Temecula
There were no other sightings in Temecula on or around May 26th 2011
Summary: I saw a bright light go on/off from the big dipper's pan. Then I saw a pin light cross the pan of the big dipper and it disappear.
divs: sighting details1. i saw a very bright light in the night sky, off the big dipper pan, in the direction of las vegas. the light was like a halogen going out. then i saw a pin light crossing the pan of the big dipper at a very fast rate, then it was gone. 2. i went out to my back yard to have a smoke. i looked up and saw my event. 3. i always look at the night sky and that's when i noticed the bright light, followed by the moving pin light. 4. the object that got my attion was the bight light going on\off and it was followed by the pin light crossing the big dippers pan. 5. my reaction is one of "what the hell did i just see?". that was during the event and after. 6. the way that i lost sight of the pin light was that it went into the night sky.
